scheme_name: Sanctioning of M.C.R. Chappals to Senior Citizens
brief_description: The "Sanctioning of M.C.R. Chappals to Senior Citizens" scheme aims to provide M.C.R. (Micro Cellular Rubber) chappals to senior citizens. This initiative ensures that eligible senior citizens receive the necessary support to improve their comfort and mobility.
detailed_description: The A.P. Differently Abled & Senior Citizens Assistance Corporation, Andhra Pradesh, launched the scheme "Sanctioning of M.C.R. Chappals to Senior Citizens" under its action plan 2017-18, aims to provide M.C.R. (Micro Cellular Rubber) chappals to senior citizens. The M.C.R. chappals are distributed by the Assistant Directors, Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled & Senior Citizens, and District Managers, A.P. Differently Abled & Senior Citizens Assistance Corporation.
benefits: Category I: Parent/Guardian income up to ₹15,000/- per month – full cost covered. Category II: Parent/Guardian income from ₹15,001 to ₹20,000/- per month – half of the cost covered. Category III: Parent/Guardian income above ₹20,000/- per month – full cost to be borne by the beneficiary.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant's age should be 60 years and above. The applicant should not have availed the benefit of this scheme earlier.

steps: Step 01: The interested student needs to visit the official website .
Step 02: Click on the "Online Applications" on the home page.
Step 03: Select the category "click here to apply for differently abled schemes"
Step 04: Now click on "Apply Online" respect to the scheme name.
If applicant was not register earlier

Step 11: Again, ask the same "Are you registered already: Yes/No Select "Yes".

documents_required: Income Certificate. Medical Recommendation (not below the rank of Assistant Civil Surgeon Certificate). Aadhaar Card. Cell/Mobile Number.
